function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited adaptability of apartment layouts to changing user needs","Impact":"Reduced livability and functionality of the space","Mitigation":"Implement flexible and detachable interior solutions","Technologies":"Modular furniture, multi-functional fixtures","People":"Tenants, residents","Owner":"Housing management, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of adequate indoor and outdoor spaces for collective living areas","Impact":"Limited social interaction and community engagement","Mitigation":"Conversion of residential or business space, addition of prefabricated structures","Technologies":"Modular construction, adaptive reuse","People":"Tenants, residents","Owner":"Housing management, building owners"}]}
